name: Southwestern Quinoa Salad
preparation: Put down a bed of lettuce. Cook quinoa per box instructions.

name: Caprese Skewers
description: All the perks of a caprese salad in a more share-able format
preparation: Alternate skewering slices of basil, mozzorella and cherry tomatoes. Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic vinegar. Sprinkle with pepper to taste.

name: Chicken Parmesan Baked Ziti
description: Pasta, chicken, parmesan... What else could you ask for?
preparation: 1) Preheat oven to 375 degrees F. 2) Cook the pasta al dente in a large stockpot of well-salted boiling according to package instructions. Drain. Return pasta to the stockpot and add chicken and tomato sauce. Gently toss to combine until the pasta is evenly coated. 3) Pour half of the pasta into a greased 11x7-inch or 9x13-inch baking dish. Sprinkle evenly with 1 cup of mozzarella cheese, half of the Parmesan cheese and half of the basil. Layer the remaining half of the pasta evenly on top. Sprinkle evenly with the remaining 1/2 cup of mozzarella cheese. 4) Bake for 20-25 minutes until the cheese is melted and just barely starts to turn golden. Remove and sprinkle immediately with the remaining Parmesan cheese and fresh basil. Serve warm.

name: Deviled Eggs
description: A crowd favorite for a reason! Versatile and delicious, here's a classic version.
preparation: Cover Eggs in cold water. Bring water to a rapid boil and turn off heat, let sit for 12 minutes. Rinse under cold water and then remove shells. Cut eggs in half and scoop yolks into bowl with 2 tablespoons of mustard and 4 tablespoons of mayonaise. Mix together until smooth and put into a piping bag. Pipe filling into egg shells and garnish with paprika and chives.

name: Chocolate Nutella Dessert Pasta
description: No better way to finish a meal than with a chocolate, hazelnut fettuccine.
preparation: Bring large stockpot of water to boil and cook chocolate fettuccine for 10 minute and then drain. In a large saucepan melt 2 tablespoons of butter, 1 cup of nutella and 1/4 cup heavy cream. Stir until mixture has thickened and stir in pasta, serve immediately, garnish with raspberries if desired.

name: Tuscan Soup
description: An Italian favorite, sausage, potatoes, kale, in a cream base.
preparation: Brown Sausage in medium skillet. In large stockpot bring beef broth to a simmer and then add diced onion and potatoes, and sausage. Cook until potatoes are tender. Turn heat to low and add heavy cream and then add kale, cook for 10 minutes then serve.
